txt.en: 'Men, I have gathered you here for a toast. Gondor has lost many brave souls, and we must honour them. Not with sorrow, but with joy.'

'Lord Elessar has asked me to do something for the men? I will do my best, if my king wishes it. This would have been a task better suited to someone like Forlong, but alas, it falls to me.

'He is not mistaken. Gondor has lost much already, but we all know that if we do not act now, we will lose everything. What would Forlong have done?

'I have an idea. Gather the men from around camp, and some kegs of ale. Then, meet me back here. We will celebrate one last time before we march bravely into the Enemy's maw.'

'We will celebrate their lives, and the bravery that saved Gondor from a wretched evil! And we will face this same evil with joy in our hearts, for we know we fight in their name, and the name of Gondor!'
'Forlong had a song that he loved, and he was rather pushy about everyone singing it before the Battle of Pelennor Fields, as was his way. Well, now I too shall be pushy about singing it!'
'I'm sure you all remember it, he made sure of that! A song that makes the heart yearn for adventure! Who will join me in a round?'
You can find soldiers and kegs in the Camp of the Host, on the northern edge of North Ithilien.\n\nGolasgil has asked you to gather soldiers and kegs of ale.
Join Golasgil in singing Authlin's Song to lift the hearts of the gathered men.
Golasgil can be found in the Camp of the Host, on the northern edge of North Ithilien.\n\nThe celebration has gone off without a hitch. Now you should talk to Golasgil.
Join Golasgil and the men in toasting to those who fell on the Pelennor.
'Well, my spirits are certainly lifted! We will march to our destiny with a song in our hearts. For Gondor and for all the Free Peoples. I think Forlong would not be ashamed of us, [placeholder].'
'Thank you, [placeholder]. The men and ale are gathered. Here goes nothing.'
Aragorn wishes to do something to lift the spirits of the remaining soldiers.
Golasgil can be found in the Camp of the Host, on the northern edge of North Ithilien.\n\nLord Aragorn has asked you to talk to Golasgil.
Collect Kegs of Ale from the Camp of the Host of the West on the border of the Wastes.
'And yearn for distant lands to meet'
Golasgil can be found in the Camp of the Host, on the northern edge of North Ithilien.\n\nYou should speak with Golasgil and tell him the kegs and soldiers have been gathered.
'I'll fly away, I will not stay'

'[placeholder], while those of faint hearts have departed, I feel we must do something for the men who remain. They have lost so much already, and this may be our last true chance to bolster their spirits before we move into the Enemy's territory.\n\n'I would have you speak with Lord Golasgil. With so few Lords of Gondor left, I will need him to bear more of the burden of leadership. I know he will show a brave face in front of his men if I ask it of him.'
'But I will never turn back home'
'No I shall wend back there no more'
'No more, no more, no more, no more....'
